General.Name: ANJI Technology Co. Ltd
General.Description: ANJI Technology Co., Ltd. engages in developing, manufacturing, and selling solar modules for power generation systems in Taiwan. It offers poly and mono crystalline, double glass, and building integrated photovoltaic solar modules, as well as AC modules. The company also provides 3D printing services. ANJI Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Táinán, Taiwan.
